title: In the home stretch! Please help me finish a WaJo run...
author: brass_rat

posts.post_title: In the home stretch! Please help me finish a WaJo run...
posts.post_content:
[Also posted in the T206 section, but I am looking for (dreaming of) a few non-T206 in the hands-at-chest pose, so I figured I'd post here as well.  Thank you.]

I'm down to a few cards needed for my Walter Johnson (hands-at-chest) back run.  I look forward to posting the run once I find the SC 350/25 and the P42!

If anybody has ever seen a T215-1, please let me know -- I've only ever seen scans of the Type 2.

Cheers,
Steve
